schemaObjectClasses.title: Scheme
schemaObjectClasses.generateSchemaBtnTooltip: Generates and saves system scheme. Scheme is obtained from connector used by current configuration. When generating scheme, if object or attribute with the same name is found, it will be replaced by the current value in system. Other objects and attributes will remain unchanged.

create.header: New type of object in system

save.success: Object type [{{name}}] in system was successfully saved

generateSchema.message:
Generate and save scheme in this system. Scheme will be obtained from connector based on current configuration.
If there will be object or attribute with the same name, it will be replaced (regenerated by state on end system). Other objects and attributes will remain unchanged.

Do you really want to start schema generating / recovery?
generateSchema.success: Generation of scheme for system '{{name}}' successful.

startSynchronization.message: Do you really want to start synchronization/reconciliation '{{name}}' manually?
startSynchronization.started: Synchronization/reconciliation '{{name}}' started as long running task, results will be shown on synchronization detail or in long running task agenda.

cancelSynchronization.message: Do you really want to stop synchronization/reconciliation '{{name}}'?

systemSynchronizationConfigDetail.title: Synchronization details
systemSynchronizationConfigDetail.situationActionsAndWf: In section below, it is possible to define how synchronization will react in given situations. Synchronization behavior is affected by selected workflow. Workflow is started after execution of standard action for each element. Workflow must ensure changes are saved.
systemSynchronizationConfigDetail.customFilterInfo: Custom filter can be defined by selection of attribute (Filter by attribute) by which we want to find relevant operations (Filtering operations). More complicated criteria can be defined in section below.
systemSynchronizationConfigDetail.treeInfo: Synchronization of Tree is always execute as reconciliation.

create.success: Configuration of  synchronization [{{name}}] was successfully created

save.success: Configuration of synchronization [{{name}}] was successfully saved

help.body:
You can define a custom filter simply by selecting the Filter by attribute attribute according to which we want to search and the corresponding operations ( Filter operations ).

If you need to create a more complex filtering criterion, you can use this script.
The example below shows the situation where we want to filter by the selected attribute and operation (it enters the script as filter ), but we want to limit the results to another condition. In this case, so that all results must have the attribute "lastname " (by schema) equal to "Doe". 

 import eu.bcvsolutions.idm.ic.filter.impl.IcFilterBuilder; 
 import eu.bcvsolutions.idm.ic.api.IcAttribute; 
 import eu.bcvsolutions.idm.ic.impl.IcAttributeImpl; 
 
 IcAttribute attr = new IcAttributeImpl ("lastname", "Doe"); 
 
 return IcFilterBuilder.and ( filter, IcFilterBuilder.equalTo (attr));

IcFilterBuilder provides operations

  • IcFilterBuilder.equalTo(...)
  • IcFilterBuilder.contains(...)
  • IcFilterBuilder.startsWith(...)
  • IcFilterBuilder.endsWith(...)
  • IcFilterBuilder.or(...)
  • IcFilterBuilder.and(...)
  • IcFilterBuilder.not(...)
The output of this script must be IcFilter. If null is output, then the filter will not be applied and synchronization will be run over all accounts.

defaultTreeType.label: Default type of structure
defaultTreeType.helpBlock: Relations will be assigned (searched) for positions within the selected structure.

defaultTreeNode.label: Default position in structure
defaultTreeNode.helpBlock: If the position for a given relation is not filled in the source system, then this will be used as the default.

defaultLeader.label: Default leader
defaultLeader.helpBlock: If the none leader for a given relation is filled in the source system, then this will be used as the default.

startOfHrProcesses.label: After end, start the HR processes
startOfHrProcesses.helpBlock: After successful synchronization, HR processes will be executed.

startAutoRoleRec.label: After end, start the automatic role recalculation
startAutoRoleRec.helpBlock: After successful synchronization will be start recalculation of all automatic role by attribute.

defaultRole.label: Default role
defaultRole.helpBlock: If the synchronization creates a link between an identity and an account, this role will be assigned to the identity. This assignment will be linked to the main contractual relationship of the identity.

startAutoRoleRec.label: After end, start the automatic role recalculation
startAutoRoleRec.helpBlock: After successful synchronization will be start recalculation of all automatic role by attribute.

createDefaultContract.label: Create default contracts for new identities
createDefaultContract.helpBlock: During the creation of new identities, will be also created default contract. For create new default contract must be enabled function 'Creating default contracts' in application configuration.

displayName.label: Name
displayName.placeholder: Finds logs containing value in name.

save.success: Account in system was successfully created

button.checkSystemTooltip: Saves current settings and requires test on connector.

save.success: Connector configuration for system [{{name}}] successfully saved.

changeConnector.message:
Immediate save of system with new connector.
Current connector will no longer be active and its configuration will be lost.

Do you really want to change connector and save system?

mappingDetail.header: Mapping of attributes <small>for IdM entity and operation type</small>

save.success: IdM entity type [{{entityType}}] for operation [{{operationType}}] successfully saved

protectionEnabled.help: Enables account protection before deletion. When trying to remove an IdM account (last relation assigning this account), it will be marked as 'Is protected'. Such an account will not be deleted or provisioned. To really delete the IdM account (and thus the account on the end system), it will occur after the expiration of the protection interval. Deleting performs a scheduled task.

systemMissingIdentifier.message: Beware: None of mapped attributes are marked as identifier.
systemMissingIdentifier.info: When there is not any identifier, then a role assigned to this system cannot be assigned to any identity.

systemMissingOwner.message: Beware: The contractual relationship should have the attribute mapping the 'Owner' field.

attributeDetail.title: Attribute in schema
attributeDetail.returnedByDefaultTooltip: Attribute contained in result of account search. This is not applied, for example, to password attribute, which is not returned in result by default

attributeMappingDetail.title: Attribute in IdM
attributeMappingDetail.alertNoRepository: Attribute is not mapped to any entity in CzechIdM or extended attribute. Output will be a constant from 'Transformation to system'
attributeMappingDetail.infoPasswordMapping: If attribute __PASSWORD__ is equal to value NULL, it will be automatically generated from password policy for system.

retry.message: Retry only selected operation {{name}}. Only selected operation will be executed regardless of other records in queue. Sequence of operations may not be followed.
retry.message_plural: Retry only {{count}} selected operations. Only selected operation will be executed regardless of other records in queue. Sequence of operations may not be followed.
retry.batchMessage: Retry all operations for selected entity {{name}} in queue. All operations for selected entity will be sent to system. Sequence sorted as per time of entering queue. Final state of entity in system will be retained
retry.batchMessage_plural: Retry all operations for selected entity by {{count}} selected operations in queue. All operations for selected entities will be sent to system. Sequence sorted as per time of entering queue. Final state of entities in system will be retained
retry.success: Retrying of provisioning operations has been started.

cancel.message: Or do you want to cancel just selected operation {{name}}?
cancel.message_plural: Or do you want to cancel just {{count}} selected operations?
cancel.batchMessage: Do you want to cancel all operations for entity {{name}} in queue?
cancel.batchMessage_plural: Do you want to cancel all operations for entity {{count}} in queue?

button.label: Cancel operations
button.title: Cancel operations from provisioning queue of filtered records

cancelAll.message: Do you want to cance operations from provisioning queue of filtered records? All operations for filtered entities will be canceled.
cancelAll.accepted: Long running task, which will cancel operations from provisioning queue, was started.

button.label: Delete all operations
button.title: Delete all operations from provisioning queue

deleteAll.message: Do you want to delete operations from provisioning queue? All operations for selected system will be deleted.

provisioningBreakConfig.title: Provisioning brake
provisioningBreakConfig.recipientInfo: You can add the recipients only after the brake has been created.

delete.message:
Do you want to remove selected record [{{record}}]?

Global configurations will be removed from the list of deleted.
delete.message_plural:
Selected records: [{{records}}].

Do you want to remove {{count}} selected records?

Global configurations will be removed from the list of deleted.

readonly.label: Read-only
readonly.help: Active provisioning operations create, update and delete, will not be executed.

queue.label: Asynchronous provisioning
queue.help: Active provisioning operations (create, update, delete), will run through the queue asynchronously. Change password operation will be still synchronous. Queue processing interval is configurable by long running task (ProvisioningQueueTaskExecutor).

remoteConnector.label: Use remote connector server
remoteConnector.help: After check, local connectors will not be used.

createOperation.label: Block create operation
createOperation.help: All creation operations will be blocked

updateOperation.label: Block edit operation
updateOperation.help: All editing operations will be blocked

deleteOperation.label: Block delete operation
deleteOperation.help: All deletion operations will be blocked

forwardAccountManagemen.label: Forward account management
forwardAccountManagemen.help: If checked, then an account on this system is created even though the assignment of this role to the user will be valid in the future.

wish.label: Wish
wish.help: If wish is checked, then IdM doesn't know about entity on target system yet (not provisioned or linked).

canBeAccountCreatedScript.label: Can an account be created?
canBeAccountCreatedScript.help: Account Management - allows you to disable the account creation (for that entity) on this system. The input parameter of this Groovy script is IdM entity 'entity', generated account identifier 'uid' and IdM system 'system'. Output value must be Boolean.TRUE or Boolean.FALSE!

idmPropertyName.label: IdM key
idmPropertyName.help: Name of entity attr., name of extended attr., or key to confidential storage.

transformToResourceScriptSelectBox.label: Available scripts for transformation to resource
transformToResourceScriptSelectBox.help: After script selection, will be automatically insert code which calls selected script including sample parameters.

transformFromResourceScriptSelectBox.label: Available scripts for transformation from resource
transformFromResourceScriptSelectBox.help: After script selection, will be automatically insert code which calls selected script including sample parameters.

transformFromResourceScript.label: Transformation from system
transformFromResourceScript.help: Allows value to be transformed from system into a form suitable for CzechIdM. Input parameters of this Groovy script are value of the attribute 'attributeValue' and list 'icAttributes' of object attributes in system.

authenticationAttribute.label: Authentication attr.
authenticationAttribute.help: Attribute used for authentication on connected system.

transformToResourceScript.label: Transformation to system
transformToResourceScript.help: Allows value to be transformed from CzechIdM into a form suitable for connected system. Input parameters of this Groovy script are value of attribute 'attributeValue', IdM entity 'entity' and account identifier 'uid'. If output value is empty, system automatically uses available account identifier (uid).

uid.label: Identifier
uid.tooltip: Attribute is unique identifier of object.

sendOnlyIfNotNull.label: Send IdM value only if its not null
sendOnlyIfNotNull.tooltip: Value for this attribute (computed by CzechIdM), will be sent on target system only if value is not null.

sendAlways.label: Send always
sendAlways.tooltip: Value for this attribute will be always send on target system. Even if is not changed.

disabledAttribute.label: Disabled
disabledAttribute.tooltip: Disabled attribute will not be used in provisioning in default state. It can still be overload and activated in roles.

cached.label: The value is cached
cached.help: The attribute value will be saved and read from the cache. At this moment, it is used only in sync. The key is this attribute and attributes from the end system (IcAttribute). The value is the transformed value from the end system.

sendOnPasswordChange.label: Include on password change
sendOnPasswordChange.help: Send this attribute into provisioning, when password is changed.

name.label: Name
name.help: User-defined name of this system attribute, overloaded by the role.

RoleSystemAttribute.disabledDefaultAttributeTooltip: If checked, attribute will never be send to system. Even if the attribute has default mapping.

transformScript.label: Transformation to system
transformScript.help: Allows to transform value from CzechIdM to state intended for connected system. Input parameters of this Groovy script are attribute value 'attributeValue', IdM entity 'entity' and account identifier 'uid'. If script output value is null, than returning value is available account identifier (uid).

customFilter.label: Use custom filter
customFilter.help: Synchronization will be managed by custom filter defined below. When not selected, synchronization is managed by connector mechanisms. The filter is NOT used during reconciliation.

filterAttribute.label: Filter by attribute
filterAttribute.help: This attribute (with type of filter operation) will be used as default filter criteria for synchronization. Other criteria can be defined in filter script.

customFilterScript.label: Custom filter
customFilterScript.help: This Groovy script sets own search filter for accounts in system to be synchronized.

rootsFilterScript.label: Definition of tree roots
rootsFilterScript.help: This Groovy script sets definition of tree root. Script input is 'account' (IcObject). Output must be Boolean ('true' for root). Without script implementation, every element without parent is consider as root.

reconciliation.label: Reconciliation
reconciliation.help: Executes full reconciliation instead of synchronization. Synchronization will be executed for all accounts without filter. Search for missing accounts will be executed for all entities in CzechIdM.

ERROR.LINK_AND_UPDATE_ENTITY: Unsuccessfully created accounts and updated entities

operationType.label: Type of blocked operation
operationType.help: The type of operation for which the brake will affect.

warningLimit.label: Warning limit
warningLimit.help: Number of operations from which a warning message will be sent.

period.label: Period [min]
period.help: The period by which the limits of operations are calculated. The unit is minutes.

disableLimit.label: Disable limit
disableLimit.help: Number of operations from which all subsequent operations will be blocked.

warningTemplate.label: Warning template
warningTemplate.help: A message with this template will be sent if the warning limit is exceeded. Otherwise default template will be used, by notification configuration (topic: acc:provisioningBreakWarning).

disableTemplate.label: Disable template
disableTemplate.help: A message with this template will be sent if the block limit is exceeded. Otherwise default template will be used, by notification configuration (topic: acc:provisioningBreakWarning).

actualOperationCount.label: Number of processed operations
actualOperationCount.help: Number of operations processed for this provisioning brake (from last successful provisioning).

AttributeMappingStrategyTypeEnum.CREATE: Write only on create of the entity
AttributeMappingStrategyTypeEnum.WRITE_IF_NULL: Write only if target value is null

group.CONTRACTSLICEACCOUNT: Accounts for time slices of contractual relationships

quoting.label: Name Quoting
quoting.help: Select whether database column names for this resource should be quoted, and the quoting characters. By default, database column names are not quoted (None). For other selections (Single, Double, Back, or Brackets), column names will appear between single quotes, double quotes, back quotes, or brackets in the SQL generated to access the database.

host.label: Host
host.help: Enter the name of the host where the database is running.

port.label: Port
port.help: Enter the TCP port number the database server is listening on.

user.label: User
user.help: Enter the name of the mandatory Database user with permission to account table.

password.label: User Password
password.help: Enter a user account password that has permission to access accounts table.

database.label: Database
database.help: Enter the name of the database on the database server that contains the table.

table.label: Table
table.help: Enter the name of the table in the database that contains the accounts.

keycolumn.label: Key Column
keycolumn.help: This mandatory column value will be used as the unique identifier for rows in the table.

passwordcolumn.label: Password Column
passwordcolumn.help: Enter the name of the column in the table that will hold the password values. If empty, no validation on resource and passwords are activated.

statuscolumn.label: Status Column
statuscolumn.help: Enter the name of the column in the table that will hold the status values. If empty enabled and disabled operation wont be performed.

disabledstatusvalue.label: Disabled Status Value
disabledstatusvalue.help: Enter the value for disabled status. Default is "false".

enabledstatusvalue.label: Enabled Status Value
enabledstatusvalue.help: Enter the value for enabled status. Default is "true".

defaultstatusvalue.label: Default Status Value
defaultstatusvalue.help: Enter the value for status in case of status not specified. Default is "true".

jdbcdriver.label: JDBC Driver
jdbcdriver.help: Specify the JDBC Driver class name. Oracle is oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver. MySQL is org.gjt.mm.mysql.Driver. Could be empty if datasource is provided.

jdbcurltemplate.label: JDBC Connection URL
jdbcurltemplate.help: Specify the JDBC Driver Connection URL. Oracle template is jdbc:oracle:thin:@[host]:[port(1521)]:[DB]. MySQL template is jdbc:mysql://[host]:[port(3306)]/[db], for more info, read the JDBC driver documentation. Could be empty if datasource is provided.

enableemptystring.label: Enable writing empty string
enableemptystring.help: Select to enable support for writing an empty strings, instead of a NULL value, in character based columns defined as not-null in the table schema. This option does not influence the way strings are written for Oracle based tables. Default is "false".

rethrowallsqlexceptions.label: Rethrow all SQLExceptions
rethrowallsqlexceptions.help: If this is not checked, SQL statements which throw SQLExceptions with a 0 ErrorCode will be have the exception caught and suppressed. Check it to have exceptions with 0 ErrorCodes rethrown. Default is "true".

nativetimestamps.label: Native Timestamps
nativetimestamps.help: Select to retrieve Timestamp data type of the columns in java.sql.Timestamp format from the database table. Default is "false".

allnative.label: All native
allnative.help: Select to retrieve all data type of the columns in a native format from the database table. Default is "false".

validconnectionquery.label: Validate Connection Query
validconnectionquery.help: There can be specified the check connection alive query. If empty, default implementation will test it using the switch on/off the autocommit. Some select 1 from dummy table could be more efficient.

changelogcolumn.label: Change Log Column (Sync)
changelogcolumn.help: The change log column store the latest change time. Providing this value the Sync capabilities are activated.

datasource.label: Datasource Path
datasource.help: Enter the JDBC Data Source Name/Path to connect to the Oracle server. If specified, connector will only try to connect using Datasource and ignore other resource parameters specified. An the example value is: jdbc/SampleDataSourceName

jndiproperties.label: Initial JNDI Properties
jndiproperties.help: Could be empty or enter the JDBC JNDI Initial context factory, context provider in a format: key = value.

cipheralgorithm.label: Password cipher algorithm
cipheralgorithm.help: Cipher algorithm used to encode password before to store it onto the database table. Specify one of the values among CLEARTEXT,AES, MD5, SHA1, SHA256 or a custom implementation identified by its class name. Default is "CLEARTEXT".

pwdencodetouppercase.label: Force password encoding to upper case
pwdencodetouppercase.help: Force password encoding to upper case. Default is "false".

cipherkey.label: Password cipher key
cipherkey.help: Specify key in case of reversible algorithm.

pwdencodetolowercase.label: Force password encoding to lower case
pwdencodetolowercase.help: Force password encoding to lower case. Default is "false".

retrievepassword.label: Retrieve password
retrievepassword.help: Specify if password must be retrieved by default. Default is "false".

passwordcharset.label: Resource Password Charset
passwordcharset.help: Specify Character set used by resource to encode clear text password. Default is "UTF-8".

role-acm-bulk-action.label: Invoke account management
role-acm-bulk-action.help: This operation invokes account management for each selected role. The account management will be invoke for all users with the role. Account management itself and subsequent provisioning are performed asynchronously. You can see progress of this operations in the Events agenda.

system-duplicate-bulk-action.label: Duplicate the system
system-duplicate-bulk-action.help: Creates copy of selected systems duplicate contains all configurations. New system (and his syncs) will be inactive.

system-delete-bulk-action.label: Remove
system-delete-bulk-action.help: Remove selected systems. Removed system must not contains any accounts and unresolved provisioning operations.

IMPORT_WRONG_LINE_LENGTH.title: Wrong file format
IMPORT_WRONG_LINE_LENGTH.message: On line [{{number}}] in given file is some error.

IMPORT_CANT_READ_FILE_PATH.title: Cannot read file path
IMPORT_CANT_READ_FILE_PATH.message: Can read the file in path [{{path}}]. Please check if you put in right path.

SYSTEM_SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTES_NOT_FOUND.title: No schema attributes were found
SYSTEM_SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTES_NOT_FOUND.message: Schema [{{schema}}] on system [{{system}}] have no attributes.

SYSTEM_NAME_NOT_FOUND.title: System was not found
SYSTEM_NAME_NOT_FOUND.message: System [{{system}}] was not found. Please, check if name is right.

CONNECTOR_OBJECT_CLASS_NOT_FOUND.title: Connector object class was not found
CONNECTOR_OBJECT_CLASS_NOT_FOUND.message: Connector object class for system [{{system}}] was not found. Please, check if some schema was generated.

CONNECTOR_CONFIGURATION_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_F.title: Connector was not selected
CONNECTOR_CONFIGURATION_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_F.message: Connector for system [{{system}}] is not defined. Please, select connector definition in system settings.

CONNECTOR_INSTANCE_NOT_FOUND.title: Connector instance was not found
CONNECTOR_INSTANCE_NOT_FOUND.message: Connector instance for system [{{system}}] was not found. Please, make sure you added right system name.

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.title: Unique identifier already exists
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.message: System [{{system}}] has already set unique identifier.

PROVISIONING_BREAK_OPERATION_EXISTS.title: Duplicate brake configuration for the system
PROVISIONING_BREAK_OPERATION_EXISTS.message: Brake configuration for this operation type [{{operationType}}] and system [{{systemId}} already exists.

PROVISIONING_ROLE_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.title: Unique identifier already exists
PROVISIONING_ROLE_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.message: Role [{{role}}] and system [{{system}}] have already set unique identifier.

PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_DISABLED.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] wasn't executed
PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_DISABLED.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] wasn't executed. System is configured as inactive.

PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_READONLY.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] not executed
PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_READONLY.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] wasn't executed. System is in read-only mode.

PROVISIONING_PREPARE_ACCOUNT_ATTRIBUTES_.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] wasn't executed
PROVISIONING_PREPARE_ACCOUNT_ATTRIBUTES_.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] failed.

PROVISIONING_FAILED.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] wasn't executed
PROVISIONING_FAILED.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] failed.

PROVISIONING_SUCCEED.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] executed
PROVISIONING_SUCCEED.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] successfully finished.

PROVISIONING_IS_IN_QUEUE.title: Provisioning task for account [{{name}}] stored to queue
PROVISIONING_IS_IN_QUEUE.message: Account has some unfinished provisioning tasks in queue. New provisioning task for account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] was stored to queue.

PROVISIONING_IDM_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.title: Item for provisioning not found
PROVISIONING_IDM_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.message: IdM item [{{property}}] for entity [{{entityType}}] was not found!

PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.title: System [{{system}}] not support change password
PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.message: Mapping attribute for password (___PASSWORD__) for entity [{{entity}}] was not found!

PROVISIONING_SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_UPD.title: Provisioning - attribute is not able for update
PROVISIONING_SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_UPD.message: Attribute [{{attribute}}] for entity [{{entity}}] is not 'able for update'!

PROVISIONING_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.title: Provisioning - attribute was not found on connected system
PROVISIONING_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.message: Attribute [{{attribute}}] for entity [{{entity}}] was not found on connected system!

PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_WRONG_TYPE.title: Provisioning - password must be GuardedString
PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_WRONG_TYPE.message: Password attribute must be type of GuardedString!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.title: Provisioning - attribute value is not in correct type
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.message: Schema of attribute [{{attribute}}] defines type of [{{schemaAttributeType}}]. But value type is [{{valueType}}]!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_NOT_FOUND.title: Provisioning - attribute value was not found
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_NOT_FOUND.message: Attribute schema [{{attribute}}] defines type [{{schemaAttributeType}}]. This type cannot be retrieved!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_IS_NOT_STRING.title: Provisioning - UID value is not String
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_IS_NOT_STRING.message: Value of UID attribute must be type of String, but given type is [{{uid}}]!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_NOT_FOUND.title: Provisioning - UID attribute was not found
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_NOT_FOUND.message: UID attribute was not found in system [{{system}}]. UID attribute is necessary for provisioning (or sync)!

PROVISIONING_DUPLICATE_ROLE_MAPPING.title: Provisioning - More attribute definitions for the same role
PROVISIONING_DUPLICATE_ROLE_MAPPING.message: There was found more definitions of attributes for same role [{{role}}], in system [{{system}}] and entity type [{{entityType}}]!

PROVISIONING_DIFFERENT_UIDS_FROM_CONNECT.title: Provisioning - UID attribute not found
PROVISIONING_DIFFERENT_UIDS_FROM_CONNECT.message: Connector returned more different UIDs, for different object classes!

PROVISIONING_MERGE_ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_MULT.title: Provisioning - MERGE is not multivalued
PROVISIONING_MERGE_ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_MULT.message: Object [{{object}}]. For MERGE strategy must be attribute [{{attribute}}] multivalued!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_STRATEGY_CONFLICT.title: Provisioning - Attribute strategy conflict
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_STRATEGY_CONFLICT.message: Strategies [{{strategyParent}} (role {{roleParent}})] and [{{strategyConflict}} (role {{roleConflict}})] are in conflict for attribute [{{attribute}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_SYSTEM_IS_NOT_ENABLED.title: System is disabled
SYNCHRONIZATION_SYSTEM_IS_NOT_ENABLED.message: Synchronization [{{name}}] cannot be started, because system [{{system}}] is disabled!

CONFIDENTIAL_VALUE_IS_NOT_GUARDED_STRING.title: Confidential attribute is not GuardedString
CONFIDENTIAL_VALUE_IS_NOT_GUARDED_STRING.message: Confidential attribute [{{property}}] is not type of GuardedString, but it's [{{class}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_CORRELATION_TO_MANY_RESU.title: Synchronization - too many entities was found for correlation attribute
SYNCHRONIZATION_CORRELATION_TO_MANY_RESU.message: Too many entities was found for correlation attribute [{{correlationAttribute}}] for value [{{value}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_TOKEN_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.title: Synchronization - for synchronization by custom attribute is compulsory attribute Token!
SYNCHRONIZATION_TOKEN_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.message: for synchronization by custom attribute is compulsory attribute Token!

SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_SYSTEM_ENTITY.title: Synchronization - more than one record of 'System entity' was found
SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_SYSTEM_ENTITY.message: More than one record of 'System entity was found for UID [{{uid}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_FILTER_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.title: Synchronization - filter for synchronization must be type of 'IcFilter'
SYNCHRONIZATION_FILTER_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.message: Filter for synchronization must be type of 'IcFilter', but the value type is [{{type}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_ERROR_DURING_SYNC_ITEM.title: Synchronization - error during synchronization
SYNCHRONIZATION_ERROR_DURING_SYNC_ITEM.message: During synchronization of UID [{{uid}}], unexpected error has occurred!

SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_ACC_ACCOUNT.title: Synchronization - more than one records of 'AccAccount' found
SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_ACC_ACCOUNT.message: Found more that one records of 'AccAccount' for the same UID [{{uid}}]!

SYSTEM_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_SYN.title: System mapping [{{mapping}}] cannot be removed
SYSTEM_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_SYN.message: System mapping [{{mapping}}] cannot be removed. It's used for synchronization of the same system!

SYSTEM_MAPPING_FOR_ENTITY_EXISTS.title: Mapping can not be saved
SYSTEM_MAPPING_FOR_ENTITY_EXISTS.message: Provisioning mapping for system [{{system}}] and type of entity  [{{entityType}}] already exists!

ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_.title: Attribute [{{attribute}}] cannot be removed
ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_.message: Attribute [{{attribute}}] cannot be removed. It's used for synchronization of the same system!

SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ENTITIES.title: System cannot be removed
SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ENTITIES.message: System [{{system}}] cannot be removed. There are managed entities in system.

SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_OPERATIONS.title: System cannot be removed
SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_OPERATIONS.message: System [{{system}}] cannot be removed. Active provisioning operations exist for the entity.

SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ACCOUNTS.title: System cannot be removed
SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ACCOUNTS.message: System [{{system}}] cannot be removed. There are managed accounts in system.

SYSTEM_ENTITY_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_OPERATIO.title: Entity in system cannot be removed
SYSTEM_ENTITY_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_OPERATIO.message: Entity [{{uid}}] in system [{{system}}] cannot be removed. Active provisioning operations exist for the entity.

REMOTE_SERVER_INVALID_CREDENTIAL.title: Bad password for remote connector server
REMOTE_SERVER_INVALID_CREDENTIAL.message: Bad password for remote connector server [{{server}}]

REMOTE_SERVER_CANT_CONNECT.title: Can't connect to remote connector server
REMOTE_SERVER_CANT_CONNECT.message: Can't connect to remote connector server [{{server}}]

REMOTE_SERVER_UNEXPECTED_ERROR.title: Unexpected error
REMOTE_SERVER_UNEXPECTED_ERROR.message: Unexpected error while connect to server [{{server}}]

CONNECTOR_FORM_DEFINITION_NOT_FOUND.title: Form definition for connector not found
CONNECTOR_FORM_DEFINITION_NOT_FOUND.message: Form definition for system not found, please choose connector first.

ACCOUNT_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_IS_PROTECTED.title: Account [{{uid}}] cannot be deleted!
ACCOUNT_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_IS_PROTECTED.message: Account [{{uid}}] cannot be deleted! Is protected!

ACCOUNT_CANNOT_UPDATE_IS_PROTECTED.title: Account [{{uid}}] cannot be updated!
ACCOUNT_CANNOT_UPDATE_IS_PROTECTED.message: Account [{{uid}}] cannot removed from protected state manually!

SYSTEM_MAPPING_TREE_TYPE_DELETE_FAILED.title: Tree type cannot be deleted
SYSTEM_MAPPING_TREE_TYPE_DELETE_FAILED.message: Tree type [{{treeType}}] is already use in mapping for system [{{system}}]. Remove mapping from the system before deleting.

ROLE_SYSTEM_ALREADY_EXISTS.title: Duplicate mapping
ROLE_SYSTEM_ALREADY_EXISTS.message: Mapping for same role [{{role}}] and same system [{{system}}] already exists!

SYNCHRONIZATION_CONFIG_TYPE_CANNOT_BE_CA.title: Type of sync configuration, cannot be changed!
SYNCHRONIZATION_CONFIG_TYPE_CANNOT_BE_CA.message: Type of sync configuration, cannot be changed!

PROVISIONING_BREAK_GLOBAL_CONFIG_DELETE.title: Configuration could not be deleted
PROVISIONING_BREAK_GLOBAL_CONFIG_DELETE.message: Configuration: {{name}} is global and can not be deleted.

PROVISIONING_BREAK_GLOBAL_CONFIG_SAVE.title: Configuration could not be saved
PROVISIONING_BREAK_GLOBAL_CONFIG_SAVE.message: Configuration: {{name}} is global and can not be saved.

PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_BLOCKED.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] wasn't executed
PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_BLOCKED.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] was blocked by provisioning brake.

SYSTEM_MAPPING_VALIDATION.title: Validation of system mapping {{name}} was not successful
SYSTEM_MAPPING_VALIDATION.message: Validation of system mapping {{name}} was not successful. Check this mapping settings.

PROVISIONING_NOT_SUPPORTS_ENTITY_TYPE.title: Provisioning does not supports this type
PROVISIONING_NOT_SUPPORTS_ENTITY_TYPE.message: Provisioning does not supports this entity type [{{entityType}}]

ACCOUNT_CANNOT_BE_READ_FROM_TARGET.title: Account cannot be read
ACCOUNT_CANNOT_BE_READ_FROM_TARGET.message: Account [{{account}}] cannot be read from the end system [{{system}}]!

PROVISIONING_NEW_PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT.title: Password was changed
PROVISIONING_NEW_PASSWORD_FOR_ACCOUNT.message: For object wth UID [{{uid}}] on system [{{system}}] password was set: [{{password}}].

AUTHENTICATION_AGAINST_SYSTEM_FAILED.title: Authentication failed
AUTHENTICATION_AGAINST_SYSTEM_FAILED.message: Authentication of user [{{user}}] on system [{{system}}] failed.

AUTHENTICATION_AUTHENTICATION_ATTRIBUTE_.title: Authentication failed
AUTHENTICATION_AUTHENTICATION_ATTRIBUTE_.message: Can not authenticate to system [{{system}}], because authentication attribute is not set.

CONNECTOR_KEY_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_FOUND.title: Key not found
CONNECTOR_KEY_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_FOUND.message: Connector key for system [{{system}}] not found.

CONNECTOR_SCHEMA_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_FOUND.title: Schema not found
CONNECTOR_SCHEMA_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_FOUND.message: Connector schema for system [{{system}}] not found.

PROVISIONING_SCRIPT_CAN_BE_ACC_CREATED_M.title: Wrong return value
PROVISIONING_SCRIPT_CAN_BE_ACC_CREATED_M.message: Script 'Can be account created' on system [{{system}}] must return 'boolean' value.

SYNCHRONIZATION_CORRELATION_BAD_VALUE.title: Wrong attribute value
SYNCHRONIZATION_CORRELATION_BAD_VALUE.message: Synchronization - value [{{value}}] for find correlation attribute can't be converted.

SYNCHRONIZATION_IDM_FIELD_CANNOT_BE_NULL.title: Wrong attribute value
SYNCHRONIZATION_IDM_FIELD_CANNOT_BE_NULL.message: IDM attribute [{{attr}}] can not be null.

SYNCHRONIZATION_MAPPED_ATTR_MUST_EXIST.title: Mapped attribute not exists
SYNCHRONIZATION_MAPPED_ATTR_MUST_EXIST.message: Mapped attribute for IdM field [{{property}}] must exists in system mapping.

SYNCHRONIZATION_TREE_ROOT_FILTER_VALUE_W.title: Wrong filter value
SYNCHRONIZATION_TREE_ROOT_FILTER_VALUE_W.message: Filter value for tree root is null, but it must be Boolean type.

PROVISIONING_GENERATED_UID_IS_NULL.title: UID can not be null
PROVISIONING_GENERATED_UID_IS_NULL.message: Generated UID is null for system [{{system}}]. UID of account must be String type.

PROVISIONING_TREE_PARENT_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOU.title: Account not found
PROVISIONING_TREE_PARENT_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOU.message: Account for parent tree node [{{node}}] not found.

PROVISIONING_TREE_TOO_MANY_PARENT_ACCOUN.title: Too many accounts for parent node
PROVISIONING_TREE_TOO_MANY_PARENT_ACCOUN.message: Too many accounts for parent node [{{node}}]. Excepted only one for same system.

SYNCHRONIZATION_IDM_FIELD_NOT_GET.title: Can not get attribute
SYNCHRONIZATION_IDM_FIELD_NOT_GET.message: Can not get IdM attribute [{{attr}}] for entity [{{entity}}].

SYNCHRONIZATION_IDM_FIELD_NOT_SET.title: Can not set attribute
SYNCHRONIZATION_IDM_FIELD_NOT_SET.message: Can not set IdM attribute [{{attr}}] for entity [{{entity}}].

SYNCHRONIZATION_TREE_PARENT_TREE_ACCOUNT.title: Account not found
SYNCHRONIZATION_TREE_PARENT_TREE_ACCOUNT.message: No tree account for parent UID: [{{parentUid}}] on system [{{systemId}}] with acc account: [{{parentAccount}}] was found.

SYNCHRONIZATION_TREE_PARENT_ACCOUNT_NOT_.title: Account not found
SYNCHRONIZATION_TREE_PARENT_ACCOUNT_NOT_.message: No parent account for parent UID: [{{parentUid}}] on system [{{systemId}}] was found.

PROVISIONING_BREAK_RECIPIENT_CONFLICT.title: More attributes for recipient
PROVISIONING_BREAK_RECIPIENT_CONFLICT.message: There is setting in role and identity for recipient. Allowed is only single setting.

PROVISIONING_DUPLICATE_ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING.title: Mapping attribute is duplicated
PROVISIONING_DUPLICATE_ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING.message: Schema attribute can be mapped only once (in provisioning mapping)!

SYSTEM_MAPPING_NOT_FOUND.title: Cannot find system mapping
SYSTEM_MAPPING_NOT_FOUND.message: Cannot find system mapping on system [{{systemId}}] for object class name [{{objectClassName}}].

SYSTEM_SCHEMA_OBJECT_CLASS_NOT_FOUND.title: Cannot find schema object class
SYSTEM_SCHEMA_OBJECT_CLASS_NOT_FOUND.message: Cannot find schema object class [{{objectClassName}}] on system [{{systemId}}].

SYSTEM_ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING_NOT_FOUND.title: Cannot find system attribute mapping
SYSTEM_ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING_NOT_FOUND.message: Cannot find system attribute mapping for schema [{{schemaAttr}}] on system [{{systemId}}].

SYSTEM_SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUND.title: Cannot find schema attribute
SYSTEM_SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUND.message: Cannot find schema attribute for object class name [{{objectClassName}}] and attribute name [{{attributeName}}].

ROLE_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND.title: No role account found
ROLE_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND.message: No role account found for account id [{{account}}].

ROLE_ACM_BULK_ACTION_NONE_IDENTITIES.message: The selected roles do not contain any user relationships.

SYSTEM_DELETE_BULK_ACTION_NUMBER_OF_PROV.message: System {{system}} contains {{count}} unresolved provisioning operations
